trans: 我会忙着准备我们去费加罗的行程。

Original: CELES:Don't play possum with me! Edgar? Or have you somehow lost your memory?
Dialogue: Don't play possum with me! Edgar? Or have you somehow lost your memory?

Original: GERAD:Listen, my lady, I've been "Gerad" all my life!
Dialogue: Listen, my lady, I've been "Gerad" all my life!
trans: 听着，女士，我这辈子都是“杰拉德”！

Original: CELES:Only Edgar would say, "my lady."
Dialogue: Only Edgar would say, "my lady."
trans: 只有埃德加会说：“我的女士。”

Original: GERAD:What's all the bloomin' fuss about? The words, "my lady" are used the world over!
Dialogue: What's all the bloomin' fuss about? The words, "my lady" are used the world over!
trans: 什么叫花花公子大惊小怪？

Original: GERAD:Oh, yeah, you know how to get into Figaro Castle, don't you?!
Dialogue: Oh, yeah, you know how to get into Figaro Castle, don't you?!
trans: 哦，是的，你知道如何进入费加罗城堡，不是吗？！

Original: HENCHMAN:G'ho ho, do we ever!
Dialogue: G'ho ho, do we ever!

Original: GERAD:Yeah, You lead the way since it's buried.
Dialogue: Yeah, You lead the way since it's buried.
trans: 是的，你带路，因为它被埋葬了。

Original: GERAD:Let's go help 'em... Hang on a sec... ......? Are you people STILL here?
Dialogue: Let's go help 'em... Hang on a sec... ......? Are you people STILL here?
trans: 我们去帮助他们……等一下…………？

Original: CELES:Be polite now... Edgar!
Dialogue: Be polite now... Edgar!

Original: GERAD:Case of mistaken identity, my dear. Give it up!
Dialogue: Case of mistaken identity, my dear. Give it up!

Original: SIGFRIED:Pretty dangerous from here on. I'll go in first and clear out all the monsters. Wait here.
Dialogue: Pretty dangerous from here on. I'll go in first and clear out all the monsters. Wait here.

Original: GERAD:Now, where were we...?
Dialogue: Now, where were we...?

Original: GERAD:Good Job! I used to have a turtle...!
Dialogue: Good Job! I used to have a turtle...!

Original: GERAD:You all right? You were almost a goner.
Dialogue: You all right? You were almost a goner.

Original: GERAD:Here's the problem... What a mess...
Dialogue: Here's the problem... What a mess...

Original: GERAD:You guys get in there while I keep this thing busy!
Dialogue: You guys get in there while I keep this thing busy!
trans: 在我忙这件事的时候你们进来吧！

Original: GERAD:Get going!
Dialogue: Get going!

Original: EDGAR:What're ya waiting for, Celes? Give me a hand!!
Dialogue: What're ya waiting for, Celes? Give me a hand!!

Original: CELES:Edgar! It IS you!
Dialogue: Edgar! It IS you!

Original: CELES:Why the stupid farce?
Dialogue: Why the stupid farce?

Original: EDGAR:Well, I heard that Figaro had had an accident. I wanted to help, but didn't know where to look. Then I heard that those idiots had escaped from the prison.
Dialogue: Well, I heard that Figaro had had an accident. I wanted to help, but didn't know where to look. Then I heard that those idiots had escaped from the prison.

Original: CELES:You needed to use them...
Dialogue: You needed to use them...

Original: EDGAR:Bingo. I had to wait until they led me to their secret cave.
Dialogue: Bingo. I had to wait until they led me to their secret cave.

Original: CELES:Amazing, considering that you threw most of 'em in jail to begin with!
Dialogue: Amazing, considering that you threw most of 'em in jail to begin with!
trans: 太棒了，考虑到你一开始就把他们中的大部分人都关进了监狱！

Original: EDGAR:Uh, oh...! Let's hide!
Dialogue: Uh, oh...! Let's hide!

Original: PARTY:"You don't want that treasure back...?"EDGAR:It's completely worthless. Besides, Kefka's the one we need to worry about. Those guys haven't committed any serious crimes...
Dialogue: "You don't want that treasure back...?" EDGAR It's completely worthless. Besides, Kefka's the one we need to worry about. Those guys haven't committed any serious crimes...

Original: CELES:Come on, let's go...
Dialogue: Come on, let's go...

Original: CELES:Setzer!SETZER:You're alive!?
Dialogue: Setzer! SETZER You're alive!?

Original: CELES:Come along with us! We're after Kefka!
Dialogue: Come along with us! We're after Kefka!

Original: SETZER:Phew... I don't know if I have it in me anymore...
Dialogue: Phew... I don't know if I have it in me anymore...
trans: 呼……我不知道我还有没有……

Original: CELES:What are you saying?!SETZER:I'm just a gambler...I just want to be left alone...This world is too chaotic for me. What's worse, I've lost my wings...
Dialogue: What are you saying?! SETZER I'm just a gambler...I just want to be left alone...This world is too chaotic for me. What's worse, I've lost my wings...

Original: CELES:But before the world collapsed, you fought with all your heart! You were absolutely fearless...
Dialogue: But before the world collapsed, you fought with all your heart! You were absolutely fearless...
trans: 但在世界崩塌之前，你一心战斗！

Original: SETZER:That was then... We can never have that world back!
Dialogue: That was then... We can never have that world back!
trans: 那时……我们再也无法拥有那个世界了！

Original: CELES:You want to live in this world as it is? No? Then do something about it!
Dialogue: You want to live in this world as it is? No? Then do something about it!
trans: 你想按原样生活在这个世界上吗？

Original: SETZER:Mwa ha!All right...you win! I'm starting to feel lucky!!
Dialogue: Mwa ha!All right...you win! I'm starting to feel lucky!!

Original: SETZER:Thanks... I needed that. Now, let's go visit Daryl's Tomb.
Dialogue: Thanks... I needed that. Now, let's go visit Daryl's Tomb.

Original: SETZER:......We're gonna get us another one... Airship, that is...!
Dialogue: ......We're gonna get us another one... Airship, that is...!

Original: CELES:This person...She was your friend?
Dialogue: This person...She was your friend?

Original: SETZER:Yeah. She was a piece of work. Nothing scared her...
Dialogue: Yeah. She was a piece of work. Nothing scared her...

Original: SETZER:Could be anything lurking down here, so keep your eyes peeled!
Dialogue: Could be anything lurking down here, so keep your eyes peeled!
trans: 可能有什么东西潜伏在这里，所以要睁大眼睛！

Original: SETZER:This brings back a lot of memories.
Dialogue: This brings back a lot of memories.

Original: DARYL:This experimental airship is probably a bit unstable...
Dialogue: This experimental airship is probably a bit unstable...
trans: 这艘实验飞艇估计有点不稳定……

Original: SETZER:You can't be serious! What are you trying to prove?!
Dialogue: You can't be serious! What are you trying to prove?!

Original: SETZER:Watch your step.
Dialogue: Watch your step.

Original: DARYL:If something should happen to me, the Falcon's yours!
Dialogue: If something should happen to me, the Falcon's yours!
trans: 如果我出了什么事，猎鹰就是你的了！

Original: SETZER:Nonsense! I'll win the Falcon from you when I whip you in a race! You'd better clear outta my way!
Dialogue: Nonsense! I'll win the Falcon from you when I whip you in a race! You'd better clear outta my way!

Original: DARYL:Big talk, buster!
Dialogue: Big talk, buster!

Original: SETZER:There's nothing like flying!
Dialogue: There's nothing like flying!

Original: DARYL:Come on! Stop lagging back there!
Dialogue: Come on! Stop lagging back there!

Original: DARYL:Or do you like chewing on my wake!
Dialogue: Or do you like chewing on my wake!
trans: 或者你喜欢在我醒来时咀嚼！

Original: SETZER:Listen to you!
Dialogue: Listen to you!

Original: DARYL:This time's for real. I'm going to break every record! I'll be known as the woman who flew closest to the stars!
Dialogue: This time's for real. I'm going to break every record! I'll be known as the woman who flew closest to the stars!

Original: SETZER:Be back before sunset! I'll be waiting for you on our hill.
Dialogue: Be back before sunset! I'll be waiting for you on our hill.

Original: SETZER:I restored the craft, and then put it to rest down here.
Dialogue: I restored the craft, and then put it to rest down here.
trans: 我修复了飞船，然后把它搁置在这里。

Original: EDGAR:This is THE Falcon?
Dialogue: This is THE Falcon?

Original: SETZER:I put it in storage. I couldn't bear to look at it. But now it just may save us... The Falcon.
Dialogue: I put it in storage. I couldn't bear to look at it. But now it just may save us... The Falcon.

Original: EDGAR:I finally think we're gonna pull this off!
Dialogue: I finally think we're gonna pull this off!
trans: 我终于认为我们会成功的！

Original: CELES:We can attack Kefka's tower from the air!
Dialogue: We can attack Kefka's tower from the air!
trans: 我们可以从空中攻击凯夫卡的塔！

Original: EDGAR:The Falcon's going to give us one last chance at that guy...
Dialogue: The Falcon's going to give us one last chance at that guy...
trans: 猎鹰号会给我们最后一次机会对付那个家伙……

Original: SETZER:But first we need to find our friends!
Dialogue: But first we need to find our friends!
trans: 但首先我们需要找到我们的朋友！

Original: EDGAR:Right. First things first. For once I feel hopeful!
Dialogue: Right. First things first. For once I feel hopeful!

Original: CELES:Hey! A bird!
Dialogue: Hey! A bird!

Original: CELES:Setzer! Follow that bird!
Dialogue: Setzer! Follow that bird!

Original: SETZER:But why?
Dialogue: But why?

Original: CELES:I...don't know...! Something inside just tells me it's important...
Dialogue: I...don't know...! Something inside just tells me it's important...

Original: LOLA:Look! My boyfriend in Mobliz sent me all these flowers! They're all hand-made of silk. And these are letters he has written to me...
Dialogue: Look! My boyfriend in Mobliz sent me all these flowers! They're all hand-made of silk. And these are letters he has written to me...

Original: LOLA:Could you please attach this reply to a carrier pigeon?
Dialogue: Could you please attach this reply to a carrier pigeon?
trans: 能否请您将此回复附在信鸽上？

Original: LOLA:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.

Original: CYAN:Hey!! You're alive!?
Dialogue: Hey!! You're alive!?

Original: CYAN:I shall go with you! I shan't leave the world as it is! But how did you find me? W...wait! Tell me you didn't read my letters...!!
Dialogue: I shall go with you! I shan't leave the world as it is! But how did you find me? W...wait! Tell me you didn't read my letters...!!

Original: CYAN:These... they're... um... Merely a diversion of mine...
Dialogue: These... they're... um... Merely a diversion of mine...
trans: 这些……它们是……嗯……只是我的消遣……

Original: CYAN:Mm...m...!? This is an outrage...!
Dialogue: Mm...m...!? This is an outrage...!

Original: CYAN:I learned of that poor girl when I passed through Maranda. When I heard that she sent a letter each day, but never received any replies... Something inside me snapped...
Dialogue: I learned of that poor girl when I passed through Maranda. When I heard that she sent a letter each day, but never received any replies... Something inside me snapped...
trans: 我路过马兰达时听说了那个可怜的女孩。

Original: CYAN:As I wrote to that girl, I realized I was very much like her. I was looking behind...full of despair. My eyes were closed... And then something changed...
Dialogue: As I wrote to that girl, I realized I was very much like her. I was looking behind...full of despair. My eyes were closed... And then something changed...
trans: 当我写信给那个女孩时，我意识到我很像她。

Original: OWZER:P...please... Help that painting!!
Dialogue: P...please... Help that painting!!

Original: OWZER:It's...there's a monster hiding in my prized painting of a goddess...
Dialogue: It's...there's a monster hiding in my prized painting of a goddess...
trans: 是……在我心爱的女神画中，藏着一只怪物……

Original: OWZER:Yes... And now it's nearly impossible to get it to show itself...
Dialogue: Yes... And now it's nearly impossible to get it to show itself...
trans: 是的...现在几乎不可能让它显示出来...

Original: OWZER:Relm! We can't attack this masterpiece! It would be inexcusable!
Dialogue: Relm! We can't attack this masterpiece! It would be inexcusable!

Original: CHADARNOOK:G'fu, fu, fu... Who're these numbskulls? No one...NO ONE...is going to remove me from this fine new painting!!
Dialogue: G'fu, fu, fu... Who're these numbskulls? No one...NO ONE...is going to remove me from this fine new painting!!

Original: DEMON:The girl in the picture is mine! You can't have her!
Dialogue: The girl in the picture is mine! You can't have her!

Original: RELM:Hey! Relax! The monster croaked!
Dialogue: Hey! Relax! The monster croaked!

Original: OWZER:Thanks for saving the day! This picture's more precious to me than my own life!
Dialogue: Thanks for saving the day! This picture's more precious to me than my own life!

Original: RELM:Huh?! What are you talking about?
Dialogue: Huh?! What are you talking about?

Original: OWZER:It all started when I bought a stone at the Auction House. I took one look at it and suddenly felt I needed a portrait of Starlet. I asked several artists, but none could muster enough skill. It was then that I heard about Relm's amazing ability. I brought her here, and put her to work. But while she was painting, that thing came along... It must have been enticed here by that stone.
Dialogue: It all started when I bought a stone at the Auction House. I took one look at it and suddenly felt I needed a portrait of Starlet. I asked several artists, but none could muster enough skill. It was then that I heard about Relm's amazing ability. I brought her here, and put her to work. But while she was painting, that thing came along... It must have been enticed here by that stone.
trans: 这一切都是从我在拍卖行买了一块石头开始的。

Original: OWZER:The stone? Over on that bookshelf.
Dialogue: The stone? Over on that bookshelf.

Original: OWZER:Phew. I don't need any more bad luck. Just take it and go!
Dialogue: Phew. I don't need any more bad luck. Just take it and go!

Original: RELM:I have to go! But fear not, I'll be back to finish this painting!
Dialogue: I have to go! But fear not, I'll be back to finish this painting!

Original: OWZER:I'll be waiting for you!
Dialogue: I'll be waiting for you!

Original: RELM:You!! You old fool!!! You're still standing?!
Dialogue: You!! You old fool!!! You're still standing?!

Original: STRAGO:Relm! Is that you, my dear? You're alive!!
Dialogue: Relm! Is that you, my dear? You're alive!!

Original: RELM:Idiot! Of course I'm all right!
Dialogue: Idiot! Of course I'm all right!

Original: STRAGO:Oh...I'm so happy...
Dialogue: Oh...I'm so happy...

Original: RELM:Did you think I was gonna check out before you, old man?! <D>Ah, ha, ha...
Dialogue: Did you think I was gonna check out before you, old man?! <D>Ah, ha, ha...
trans: 你以为我会比你先退房吗，老头子？！

Original: STRAGO:You're as foul-mouthed as ever, bless your heart!
Dialogue: You're as foul-mouthed as ever, bless your heart!
trans: 你一如既往地满嘴脏话，保佑你的心！

Original: RELM:Come along now...We're all glad to see you!
Dialogue: Come along now...We're all glad to see you!
trans: 快来吧……见到你我们都很高兴！

Original: STRAGO:Whoa! Well I'll be... All right, make room for me!
Dialogue: Whoa! Well I'll be... All right, make room for me!

Original: SHADOW: The only thing I know how to do is fight...
Dialogue: he only thing I know how to do is fight...
trans: 我唯一会做的事就是战斗...

Original: PARTY:"Why not come with us?"SHADOW:Well...
Dialogue: "Why not come with us?" SHADOW Well...

Original: SHADOW:First I need to see how far I can get here...
Dialogue: First I need to see how far I can get here...
trans: 首先我需要看看我能到这里多远...

Original: TERRA:Oh! I'm so glad to see that you're safe! I've missed you!
Dialogue: Oh! I'm so glad to see that you're safe! I've missed you!

Original: TERRA:That is I... um...I can't fight any longer...
Dialogue: That is I... um...I can't fight any longer...
trans: 那是我……嗯……我不能再战斗了……

Original: TERRA:The very day the world fell, Kefka turned some kind of beam on this town. Almost all of the adults perished trying to save their children...
Dialogue: The very day the world fell, Kefka turned some kind of beam on this town. Almost all of the adults perished trying to save their children...
trans: 就在世界毁灭的那一天，凯夫卡将某种光束投向了这个小镇。

Original: TERRA:There were only children here... The moment I arrived, I felt needed...
Dialogue: There were only children here... The moment I arrived, I felt needed...
trans: 这里只有孩子。。。我一到就觉得被需要了。。。

Original: DUANE:You can't take Terra away!
Dialogue: You can't take Terra away!

Original: KATARIN:Duane... Please excuse him. It's just that if Terra goes, she takes with her the very spirit of our survival...
Dialogue: Duane... Please excuse him. It's just that if Terra goes, she takes with her the very spirit of our survival...

Original: TERRA:I don't know why these kids need me...But they've made me feel things I've never felt before. The moment I sensed this, I lost my will to fight.
Dialogue: I don't know why these kids need me...But they've made me feel things I've never felt before. The moment I sensed this, I lost my will to fight.
trans: 我不知道为什么这些孩子需要我……但他们让我感受到了我以前从未感受过的东西。

Original: TERRA:I can honestly say I don't know what's going on inside of me...And the more I try to understand it, the less inclined I am to fight.
Dialogue: I can honestly say I don't know what's going on inside of me...And the more I try to understand it, the less inclined I am to fight.
trans: 老实说，我不知道我内心在想什么……我越想了解它，我就越不愿意反抗。

Original: TERRA:Phunbaba's an ancient demon who was released when the world was undone.
Dialogue: Phunbaba's an ancient demon who was released when the world was undone.
trans: Phunbaba 是一个古老的恶魔，在世界毁灭时被释放。

Original: TERRA:I've really lost it... My fighting edge...
Dialogue: I've really lost it... My fighting edge...
trans: 我真的失去了它……我的战斗力……

Original: TERRA:I'm staying here. As you can see, I can't be of any help to you. And besides, the children really need me.PARTY:"But Terra...!"
Dialogue: I'm staying here. As you can see, I can't be of any help to you. And besides, the children really need me. PARTY "But Terra...!"

Original: TERRA:Maybe after a little more time passes...I need to understand what's happening to me...
Dialogue: Maybe after a little more time passes...I need to understand what's happening to me...
trans: 也许再过一段时间……我需要了解发生在我身上的事情……

Original: TERRA:Hey you guys!
Dialogue: Hey you guys!

Original: TERRA:Katarin's having a baby.
Dialogue: Katarin's having a baby.

Original: KATARIN:I'm so happy to have had a child...But Duane seems miserable...
Dialogue: I'm so happy to have had a child...But Duane seems miserable...
trans: 我很高兴有一个孩子……但杜安似乎很痛苦……

Original: DUANE:Katarin... ... I'm sorry. I didn't know how to handle this. I've been an awful husband... But I'm learning. Please, come back with me.
Dialogue: Katarin... ... I'm sorry. I didn't know how to handle this. I've been an awful husband... But I'm learning. Please, come back with me.

Original: TERRA:I...I can fight!
Dialogue: I...I can fight!

Original: TERRA:Finally...I understand that feeling...Even though I kept it buried for so long. I'm sure it's called... ...... ...... "Love!" I now realize that we must fight for the future of our children.
Dialogue: Finally...I understand that feeling...Even though I kept it buried for so long. I'm sure it's called... ...... ...... "Love!" I now realize that we must fight for the future of our children.
trans: 终于……我明白了那种感觉……尽管我把它埋藏了这么久。

Original: TERRA:Duane... Katarin needs your help... so does your new baby. Listen children, your "Mama" has to go away for a while. I'll return when I feel your future's guaranteed!
Dialogue: Duane... Katarin needs your help... so does your new baby. Listen children, your "Mama" has to go away for a while. I'll return when I feel your future's guaranteed!
trans: Duane...Katarin 需要您的帮助...您的新宝宝也需要您的帮助。

Original: TERRA:I'll be back. I promise! Till then...you behave!
Dialogue: I'll be back. I promise! Till then...you behave!

Original: TERRA:Thank you... You helped me to understand a part of myself. Now I must go to war. We must all believe we have a future. We must fight for those who aren't even born yet!
Dialogue: Thank you... You helped me to understand a part of myself. Now I must go to war. We must all believe we have a future. We must fight for those who aren't even born yet!
trans: 谢谢你……你帮助我了解了自己的一部分。

Original: LOCKE:You're all safe! Behold...A legendary relic that can restore life...
Dialogue: You're all safe! Behold...A legendary relic that can restore life...

Original: LOCKE:Correct! Legend has it that ages ago the Phoenix was turned to stone...And many legends are based on facts...This has some major cracks in it though...I fear it may have lost its power over time...
Dialogue: Correct! Legend has it that ages ago the Phoenix was turned to stone...And many legends are based on facts...This has some major cracks in it though...I fear it may have lost its power over time...

Original: CELES:Locke...That's for Rachel, isn't it...?
Dialogue: Locke...That's for Rachel, isn't it...?
trans: 洛克……那是给瑞秋的，不是吗……？

Original: LOCKE:I wasn't able to save Rachel...I've lost all sense of purpose...My life will have no meaning until I can right this terrible wrong...
Dialogue: I wasn't able to save Rachel...I've lost all sense of purpose...My life will have no meaning until I can right this terrible wrong...
trans: 我没能救瑞秋……我已经失去了所有的目标感……除非我能纠正这个可怕的错误，否则我的生活将毫无意义……

Original: PATRIARCH:If only the Magicite didn't bear those deep cracks...I think you've been wasting your time, young man!
Dialogue: If only the Magicite didn't bear those deep cracks...I think you've been wasting your time, young man!
trans: 要是 Magicite 没有那么深的裂缝就好了……我觉得你是在浪费时间，年轻人！

Original: PATRIARCH:Uwaaaaaa! The Magicite's gonna shatter!
Dialogue: Uwaaaaaa! The Magicite's gonna shatter!

Original: RACHEL:Locke...I've dreamed of seeing you.I wanted to hear your voice.
Dialogue: Locke...I've dreamed of seeing you.I wanted to hear your voice.
trans: 洛克...我一直梦想见到你。我想听到你的声音。

Original: RACHEL:The Phoenix has given me so little time...I have to leave again soon...But I have something I must tell you...
Dialogue: The Phoenix has given me so little time...I have to leave again soon...But I have something I must tell you...
trans: 凤凰给我的时间太少了……我又要走了……但我有件事必须告诉你……

Original: RACHEL:Locke... ... With you I was so happy...In the instant that the accident occurred, I thought only of you...And about the joy you brought me. Thank you, Locke...I'll never forget you...
Dialogue: Locke... ... With you I was so happy...In the instant that the accident occurred, I thought only of you...And about the joy you brought me. Thank you, Locke...I'll never forget you...
trans: 洛克…………和你在一起我好幸福……在事故发生的那一瞬间，我只想到你……还有你带给我的快乐。

Original: RACHEL:I have to go now... ...I'll always love you...You must now cast off the anguish you've been harboring inside for so long... Today I set your heart free. You must learn to love yourself again, and regain your self respect....... Phoenix! Be reborn again!! And give your power...to Locke!!
Dialogue: I have to go now... ...I'll always love you...You must now cast off the anguish you've been harboring inside for so long... Today I set your heart free. You must learn to love yourself again, and regain your self respect....... Phoenix! Be reborn again!! And give your power...to Locke!!
trans: 我现在必须走了......我会永远爱你......你现在必须摆脱你内心深处隐藏了这么久的痛苦......今天我让你的心自由。

Original: LOCKE:Thanks, I'm okay...I feel lighter than air...From here on...I'll be all right. Let's go! We have work to do!!
Dialogue: Thanks, I'm okay...I feel lighter than air...From here on...I'll be all right. Let's go! We have work to do!!
trans: 谢谢，我没事……我感觉比空气还轻……从现在开始……我会没事的。

Original: CELES:What's up?
Dialogue: What's up?

Original: LOCKE:The treasures of the Phoenix Cave!
Dialogue: The treasures of the Phoenix Cave!

Original: LOCKE:Right, let's move out! We have an appointment with Kefka!
Dialogue: Right, let's move out! We have an appointment with Kefka!

Original: PICKPOCKET:Eh!? What're you doing here? Doesn't matter, really... nothing left anyway...There's only one Moogle still around, and only a treasure hunter could pick that lock...
Dialogue: Eh!? What're you doing here? Doesn't matter, really... nothing left anyway...There's only one Moogle still around, and only a treasure hunter could pick that lock...

Original: MOG:Kupoppo! You're alive! I thought you were all feeding the worms, kupo! Kupohoho! Let's go!
Dialogue: Kupoppo! You're alive! I thought you were all feeding the worms, kupo! Kupohoho! Let's go!

Original: MOG:Say, we could use some sasquatch muscle!! Besides, he'd be helpless here without me! He's somewhere in the mines. Once we find him, I'll order him to join us!
Dialogue: Say, we could use some sasquatch muscle!! Besides, he'd be helpless here without me! He's somewhere in the mines. Once we find him, I'll order him to join us!
trans: 说，我们可以使用一些大脚野人的肌肉！！

Original: EDGAR:It's time to break into Kefka's domain!
Dialogue: It's time to break into Kefka's domain!
trans: 是时候闯入 Kefka 的领域了！

Original: SETZER:What's wrong? Celes......
Dialogue: What's wrong? Celes......

Original: CELES:The Statues give the Espers the magical energy they need to live. If we destroy the Statues...
Dialogue: The Statues give the Espers the magical energy they need to live. If we destroy the Statues...
trans: 雕像赋予 Espers 生存所需的魔法能量。

Original: EDGAR:What'll happen?
Dialogue: What'll happen?

Original: CELES:I'm really not sure, but...
Dialogue: I'm really not sure, but...

Original: STRAGO:The Espers...and magic, too, will most definitely disappear from this world.
Dialogue: The Espers...and magic, too, will most definitely disappear from this world.
trans: 异能者……还有魔法，绝对会从这个世界上消失。

Original: EDGAR:And then...
Dialogue: And then...

Original: CELES:What will happen to ... Terra...?
Dialogue: What will happen to ... Terra...?

Original: KEFKA:I've tapped into the ultimate power. Observe...!
Dialogue: I've tapped into the ultimate power. Observe...!
trans: 我已经利用了终极力量。

Original: KEFKA:Such magnificent power! You are like insects to me!
Dialogue: Such magnificent power! You are like insects to me!

Original: KEFKA:I will exterminate everyone, and everything!
Dialogue: I will exterminate everyone, and everything!
trans: 我要灭尽所有人，灭尽一切！

Original: KEFKA:Then I'll destroy those too. Why do people rebuild things they know are going to be destroyed? Why do people cling to life when they know they can't live forever? Think how meaningless each of your lives is!
Dialogue: Then I'll destroy those too. Why do people rebuild things they know are going to be destroyed? Why do people cling to life when they know they can't live forever? Think how meaningless each of your lives is!

Original: KEFKA:And have you found your #joy#, in this nearly dead world of ours?
Dialogue: And have you found your #joy#, in this nearly dead world of ours?
trans: 在我们这个几乎死去的世界里，你找到你的#joy#了吗？

Original: TERRA:I know what love is...!
Dialogue: I know what love is...!

Original: LOCKE:And I have learned to celebrate life...and the living.
Dialogue: And I have learned to celebrate life...and the living.
trans: 我学会了庆祝生活……和活着的人。

Original: CYAN:My family lives on inside of me.
Dialogue: My family lives on inside of me.

Original: SHADOW:I know what friendship is... and family...
Dialogue: I know what friendship is... and family...
trans: 我知道什么是友谊……还有家庭……

Original: EDGAR:It is my dream to build a kingdom in which I can guarantee freedom, and dignity.
Dialogue: It is my dream to build a kingdom in which I can guarantee freedom, and dignity.
trans: 我的梦想是建立一个我可以保证自由和尊严的王国。

Original: SABIN:I have come to experience anew the love of my brother!
Dialogue: I have come to experience anew the love of my brother!
trans: 我又来体验哥哥的爱了！

Original: CELES:I've met someone who can accept me for what I am.
Dialogue: I've met someone who can accept me for what I am.
trans: 我遇到了一个可以接受我本来面目的人。

Original: SETZER:My friend's airship... and her love!
Dialogue: My friend's airship... and her love!
trans: 我朋友的飞艇……还有她的爱人！

Original: STRAGO:I have a special little Granddaughter!
Dialogue: I have a special little Granddaughter!
trans: 我有一个特别的小孙女！

Original: RELM:And I have a brave Grandpa who'll stand by me through it all.
Dialogue: And I have a brave Grandpa who'll stand by me through it all.
trans: 我有一个勇敢的爷爷，他会在这一切中支持我。

Original: MOG:I have my friends here!
Dialogue: I have my friends here!

Original: GAU:You my friends! Me uwaooo all of you!
Dialogue: You my friends! Me uwaooo all of you!

Original: KEFKA:This is sickening... You sound like chapters from a self-help booklet! Prepare yourselves!
Dialogue: This is sickening... You sound like chapters from a self-help booklet! Prepare yourselves!
trans: 这真令人作呕……你听起来像是自助手册中的章节！

Original: KEFKA:Now, for my next trick, I will make you all...disappear!
Dialogue: Now, for my next trick, I will make you all...disappear!
trans: 现在，下一招，就是让你们……消失！

Original: KEFKA:I command the greatest power in the universe! You are all helpless before me!
Dialogue: I command the greatest power in the universe! You are all helpless before me!
trans: 我掌握宇宙中最强大的力量！

Original: KEFKA:I will destroy everything... I will create a monument to non-existence!
Dialogue: I will destroy everything... I will create a monument to non-existence!
trans: 我会摧毁一切……我会创造一座不存在的纪念碑！

Original: KEFKA:No! I will hunt them down. I will destroy it all! Destroy! Destroy! Destroy!!
Dialogue: No! I will hunt them down. I will destroy it all! Destroy! Destroy! Destroy!!

Original: KEFKA:Hee, hee, hee!! But what fun is destruction if no #precious# lives are lost!
Dialogue: Hee, hee, hee!! But what fun is destruction if no #precious# lives are lost!

Original: KEFKA:Life... Dreams... Hope... Where'd they come from? And where are they headed...? These things... I am going to destroy!!
Dialogue: Life... Dreams... Hope... Where'd they come from? And where are they headed...? These things... I am going to destroy!!
trans: 生活……梦想……希望……它们从何而来？

Original: CELES:Come on, everybody! We have to work together!
Dialogue: Come on, everybody! We have to work together!

Original: CELES:Terra! What's wrong?
Dialogue: Terra! What's wrong?

Original: EDGAR:The Espers...They no longer exist...
Dialogue: The Espers...They no longer exist...
trans: 异能者……他们已经不存在了……

Original: CELES:You mean Terra too?
Dialogue: You mean Terra too?

Original: TERRA:Come with me. I can lead you out with my last ounce of strength.
Dialogue: Come with me. I can lead you out with my last ounce of strength.

Original: EDGAR:Cyan! Think you can handle that switch?!
Dialogue: Cyan! Think you can handle that switch?!

Original: CYAN:Machines... I HATE machines!
Dialogue: Machines... I HATE machines!

Original: CYAN:You just have to show technology who's boss!!
Dialogue: You just have to show technology who's boss!!
trans: 你只需要展示技术谁是老大！

Original: SETZER:Wait! Let's go that way!! Sometimes in life you just have to FEEL your way through a situation!
Dialogue: Wait! Let's go that way!! Sometimes in life you just have to FEEL your way through a situation!

Original: SETZER:Daryl...I'm starting to sound just like you!
Dialogue: Daryl...I'm starting to sound just like you!
trans: 达里尔...我开始听起来和你一样了！

Original: MOG:Heeeeelp! Save me!
Dialogue: Heeeeelp! Save me!

Original: MOG:The hair!! Watch the hair!!!
Dialogue: The hair!! Watch the hair!!!

Original: CELES:It won't open!
Dialogue: It won't open!

Original: SABIN:I didn't turn my back on the kingdom, big brother... I knew you'd be a better king. I trained hard knowing I might have to help you one day... Now I know why I have these stupid muscles!
Dialogue: I didn't turn my back on the kingdom, big brother... I knew you'd be a better king. I trained hard knowing I might have to help you one day... Now I know why I have these stupid muscles!
trans: 我没有背弃王国，大哥……我知道你会成为更好的国王。

Original: CELES:Both buttons have to be pressed simultaneously...
Dialogue: Both buttons have to be pressed simultaneously...
trans: 必须同时按下两个按钮...

Original: SETZER:Gogo! Watch Celes and do exactly what she does!
Dialogue: Gogo! Watch Celes and do exactly what she does!

Original: GAU:Gau find short cut!
Dialogue: Gau find short cut!

Original: LOCKE:I will not let go... <D>...I promise!
Dialogue: I will not let go... <D>...I promise!

Original: MADUIN:Terra...we must part now. We Espers will disappear from this world...forever. But if the human part of you is very strongly attached to something or someone...You will probably be able to remain in this world as a human being...
Dialogue: Terra...we must part now. We Espers will disappear from this world...forever. But if the human part of you is very strongly attached to something or someone...You will probably be able to remain in this world as a human being...

Original: RELM:Grandpa! Stop goofing around!!
Dialogue: Grandpa! Stop goofing around!!

Original: STRAGO:Sorry, dear...RELM:If I hear even a peep out of you, I'm gonna draw your portrait!
Dialogue: Sorry, dear... RELM If I hear even a peep out of you, I'm gonna draw your portrait!
trans: 对不起，亲爱的……RELM 如果我听到你哪怕是偷看一眼，我都会画你的肖像！

Original: STRAGO:No! Anything but that!
Dialogue: No! Anything but that!

Original: RELM:... ...but you know... Just once I'd really like to do a portrait of you...on canvas, of course!
Dialogue: ... ...but you know... Just once I'd really like to do a portrait of you...on canvas, of course!
trans: ......但是你知道......就一次我真的很想为你画一幅肖像......当然是在画布上！

Original: STRAGO:Relm! How can you be thinking about pictures at a time like this?!
Dialogue: Relm! How can you be thinking about pictures at a time like this?!

Original: SHADOW:Interceptor! Get going!
Dialogue: Interceptor! Get going!

Original: SHADOW:Stay well...
Dialogue: Stay well...

Original: SHADOW:Baram! I'm going to stop running. I'm going to begin all over again...
Dialogue: Baram! I'm going to stop running. I'm going to begin all over again...

Original: STRAGO:No...NO!!!! A "kid" like me doesn't know the meaning of defeat!
Dialogue: No...NO!!!! A "kid" like me doesn't know the meaning of defeat!

Original: EDGAR:The last piece of Magicite!
Dialogue: The last piece of Magicite!

Original: CELES:Terra! It's okay! Your power! It's fading...
Dialogue: Terra! It's okay! Your power! It's fading...

Original: CELES:Terra, your strength is going!
Dialogue: Terra, your strength is going!

Original: TERRA:Thank you, Setzer!
Dialogue: Thank you, Setzer!

Original: SETZER:Didn't I say it before?! This is the world's fastest ship!
Dialogue: Didn't I say it before?! This is the world's fastest ship!

Original: WEDGE:The Esper's gotta be in here. Move out!
Dialogue: The Esper's gotta be in here. Move out!

Original: LOCKE:Couldn't hold out...?! Uh oh...
Dialogue: Couldn't hold out...?! Uh oh...

Original: LOCKE:This is the pits. We'd better hightail it southward, to Figaro.
Dialogue: This is the pits. We'd better hightail it southward, to Figaro.

Original: MATRON:Edgar's at it again!? He hits on anything that moves!
Dialogue: Edgar's at it again!? He hits on anything that moves!

Original: EDGAR:You've been busy down south! Looking for more cities to destroy?
Dialogue: You've been busy down south! Looking for more cities to destroy?

Original: TROOPER:That's for us to know!
Dialogue: That's for us to know!

Original: EDGAR:I thought we were allies! What are you doing in my domain?
Dialogue: I thought we were allies! What are you doing in my domain?

Original: CHANCELLOR:The whole business of the succession was so repugnant to Sabin, the King's brother, that...... ......he fled the castle forever. The succession was settled with a coin toss...
Dialogue: The whole business of the succession was so repugnant to Sabin, the King's brother, that...... ......he fled the castle forever. The succession was settled with a coin toss...
trans: 国王的弟弟萨宾非常厌恶继承王位的整个过程，以至于…… ……他永远逃离了城堡。

Original: LOCKE:Edgar, What's the matter? You look positively spooked!
Dialogue: Edgar, What's the matter? You look positively spooked!

Original: EDGAR:Dddddddid you just see what I saw...?
Dialogue: Dddddddid you just see what I saw...?
trans: Ddddddd 你刚刚看到我看到了什么......？

Original: LOCKE:Yeah......this kid seems loaded for bear......
Dialogue: Yeah......this kid seems loaded for bear......
trans: 是的......这孩子似乎很适合承受......

Original: EDGAR:She's amazing! That was magic! MAGIC!
Dialogue: She's amazing! That was magic! MAGIC!

Original: LOCKE:M M M M M M M MAGIC?! She used magic?
Dialogue: M M M M M M M MAGIC?! She used magic?
trans: M M M M M M M 魔法？！

Original: EDGARLOCKE:Pswswswsw! pswswswsw!!
Dialogue: Pswswswsw! pswswswsw!!

Original: EDGAR:Terra......where on earth did you learn that?
Dialogue: Terra......where on earth did you learn that?
trans: Terra……你到底是从哪里学来的？

Original: LOCKE:Look, I didn't mean to make such a big deal of this......
Dialogue: Look, I didn't mean to make such a big deal of this......
trans: 你看，我不是有意把这件事小题大做的……

Original: EDGAR:Me either......it's just that I've never actually SEEN magic before! Where did you...?
Dialogue: Me either......it's just that I've never actually SEEN magic before! Where did you...?
trans: 我也是……只是我以前从未真正见过魔法！

Original: LOCKE:Edgar, Terra can use magic, and we can't. That's the only difference between us. The fact is......we could use her help!
Dialogue: Edgar, Terra can use magic, and we can't. That's the only difference between us. The fact is......we could use her help!
trans: 埃德加，泰拉可以使用魔法，而我们不能。

Original: TERRA:Thank you, Locke! Thank you, Edgar!
Dialogue: Thank you, Locke! Thank you, Edgar!

Original: MERCHANT:I can't take money from the King!
Dialogue: I can't take money from the King!

Original: EDGAR:Look, don't you have a family? Just shut up and take it.
Dialogue: Look, don't you have a family? Just shut up and take it.

Original: MERCHANT:Sir Sabin, I can't take your money!
Dialogue: Sir Sabin, I can't take your money!
trans: 萨宾爵士，我不能拿你的钱！

Original: SABIN:Take it! Haven't you heard? My brother says I'm a notorious spendthrift!
Dialogue: Take it! Haven't you heard? My brother says I'm a notorious spendthrift!

Original: SABIN:Master was... Vargas...
Dialogue: Master was... Vargas...

Original: DUNCANS WIFE:I'll never understand Vargas... Fortunately, my husband taught his most secret techniques to you.
Dialogue: I'll never understand Vargas... Fortunately, my husband taught his most secret techniques to you.
trans: 我永远无法理解 Vargas...幸运的是，我丈夫将他最秘密的技术教给了你。

Original: SABIN:For 10 years you've treated me like a son. I am eternally grateful!
Dialogue: For 10 years you've treated me like a son. I am eternally grateful!

Original: LOCKE:At the very least you could give me a response...
Dialogue: At the very least you could give me a response...
trans: 至少你可以给我一个回应...

Original: EDGAR:Stand back! He seems vaguely familiar... Wait a minute...!
Dialogue: Stand back! He seems vaguely familiar... Wait a minute...!

Original: EDGAR:That's Shadow...! He'd slit his mama's throat for a nickel!
Dialogue: That's Shadow...! He'd slit his mama's throat for a nickel!

Original: LOCKE:Better steer clear of him, I guess.
Dialogue: Better steer clear of him, I guess.

Original: SHADOW:Leave us. The dog eats strangers...
Dialogue: Leave us. The dog eats strangers...

Original: EDGAR:Hm... What's that smell...?
Dialogue: Hm... What's that smell...?

Original: EDGAR:Flowers... His favorite...
Dialogue: Flowers... His favorite...

Original: EDGAR:And this... His favorite tea...
Dialogue: And this... His favorite tea...
trans: 还有这个……他最喜欢的茶……

Original: EDGAR:These dishes! They were his favorite!
Dialogue: These dishes! They were his favorite!

Original: EDGAR:Sabin...he was...here?!
Dialogue: Sabin...he was...here?!

Original: EDGAR:What the...
Dialogue: What the...

Original: EDGAR:You know this guy?
Dialogue: You know this guy?

Original: MAN:Of course. He left a couple of days ago after he heard Master Duncan was slain. He headed into the mountains. I heard Duncan's son, Vargas, is missing as well. I have a bad feeling about this...
Dialogue: Of course. He left a couple of days ago after he heard Master Duncan was slain. He headed into the mountains. I heard Duncan's son, Vargas, is missing as well. I have a bad feeling about this...

Original: VARGAS:Time to put an end to this!
Dialogue: Time to put an end to this!

Original: SABIN:The Master's teachings...... Must use a Blitz technique......
Dialogue: The Master's teachings...... Must use a Blitz technique......
trans: 师父的教诲……必须要用闪击术……

Original: BANON:Who did this? Who left this piece of paper here?
Dialogue: Who did this? Who left this piece of paper here?

Original: BANON:Have you made a decision? Will you become our last ray of hope?
Dialogue: Have you made a decision? Will you become our last ray of hope?

Original: (if answering "no" to Banon repeatedly)BANON:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: BANON:I thought as much...
Dialogue: I thought as much...

Original: BANON:You're sure about this?
Dialogue: You're sure about this?

Original: TERRA:Hope... How can anyone put their hope in me?
Dialogue: Hope... How can anyone put their hope in me?
trans: 希望……谁能把希望寄托在我身上？

Original: BANON:You will? Really!!
Dialogue: You will? Really!!

Original: TERRA:But... I'm scared...
Dialogue: But... I'm scared...

Original: BANON:The person who possesses this relic need not fear harm.
Dialogue: The person who possesses this relic need not fear harm.
trans: 拥有此遗物的人不必害怕受到伤害。

Original: BANON:Please, Terra... I'd like you to take it with you.
Dialogue: Please, Terra... I'd like you to take it with you.
trans: 求你了，Terra……我希望你把它带在身边。

Original: TERRA:What is this??? <D>
Dialogue: What is this??? <D>

Original: BANON:A lucky charm. Take it!
Dialogue: A lucky charm. Take it!

Original: BANON:I have a plan! Please get everyone together!
Dialogue: I have a plan! Please get everyone together!

Original: BANON:We all know that the Empire is using Magitek power in battle. The point is, how has the Emperor created it?
Dialogue: We all know that the Empire is using Magitek power in battle. The point is, how has the Emperor created it?
trans: 我们都知道帝国在战斗中使用的是 Magitek 力量。

Original: EDGAR:I had Locke look into the rumor that the Empire is forcing the world's finest scholars to study Espers.
Dialogue: I had Locke look into the rumor that the Empire is forcing the world's finest scholars to study Espers.
trans: 我让洛克调查了关于帝国强迫世界上最优秀的学者研究 Espers 的谣言。

Original: LOCKE:All the trouble in Narshe is over an Esper, too...
Dialogue: All the trouble in Narshe is over an Esper, too...
trans: Narshe 的所有麻烦也都出在 Esper 上……

Original: TERRA:You mean there's some connection between Espers and Magitek?
Dialogue: You mean there's some connection between Espers and Magitek?
trans: 你是说 Espers 和 Magitek 之间有某种联系？

Original: BANON:I can only recall one thing linking Espers with Magitek power...
Dialogue: I can only recall one thing linking Espers with Magitek power...
trans: 我只记得一件事将 Espers 与 Magitek 的力量联系起来......

Original: EDGAR:You don't mean...
Dialogue: You don't mean...

Original: BANON:Indeed! The ancient War of the Magi...
Dialogue: Indeed! The ancient War of the Magi...

Original: LOCKE:My Grandma used to tell me stories about magical machines... Could they have been true?
Dialogue: My Grandma used to tell me stories about magical machines... Could they have been true?
trans: 我的祖母曾经给我讲过关于神奇机器的故事……它们可能是真的吗？

Original: EDGAR:Could that ancient tragedy be playing out once again...
Dialogue: Could that ancient tragedy be playing out once again...
trans: 难道那场古老的悲剧又要上演了……

Original: BANON:It's just speculation... But historical studies have provided a number of conflicting and frightening theories... According to one theory, humans and machines were imbued with powers drained from Espers...
Dialogue: It's just speculation... But historical studies have provided a number of conflicting and frightening theories... According to one theory, humans and machines were imbued with powers drained from Espers...
trans: 这只是猜测……但历史研究提供了许多相互矛盾和可怕的理论……根据一种理论，人类和机器都被赋予了从 Espers 中抽取的力量……

Original: TERRA:That could explain Magitek power...
Dialogue: That could explain Magitek power...
trans: 这可以解释 Magitek 的力量......

Original: EDGAR:We can only fight Magitek enemies with Magitek weapons...
Dialogue: We can only fight Magitek enemies with Magitek weapons...
trans: 我们只能用 Magitek 武器与 Magitek 敌人战斗......

Original: BANON:It's risky, but if we have Terra...speak with that Esper, it might just wake up...
Dialogue: It's risky, but if we have Terra...speak with that Esper, it might just wake up...
trans: 这是有风险的，但如果我们有 Terra……和那个 Esper 说话，它可能会醒来……

Original: EDGAR:I wonder if that's wise...?
Dialogue: I wonder if that's wise...?

Original: BANON:Who can say? Regardless, we need Terra's help.
Dialogue: Who can say? Regardless, we need Terra's help.

Original: TERRA:I'll do it!
Dialogue: I'll do it!

Original: SABIN:What nonsense! You sound as if you're enjoying this!
Dialogue: What nonsense! You sound as if you're enjoying this!

Original: BANON:What? What's that noise?
Dialogue: What? What's that noise?

Original: LOCKE:These are a little too big, but they'll do.
Dialogue: These are a little too big, but they'll do.
trans: 这些有点太大了，但他们会做的。

Original: LOCKE:Ouch!! I gotta steal me some new clothes, fast!!
Dialogue: Ouch!! I gotta steal me some new clothes, fast!!

Original: DUNCANS WIFE:I'm sure there's a hidden passage under the rich man's house. Find the room that's drafty.
Dialogue: I'm sure there's a hidden passage under the rich man's house. Find the room that's drafty.
trans: 我确定有钱人的房子下面有一条隐藏的通道。

Original: MERCHANT:Look! As luck would have it, I'm fresh out of merchandise!
Dialogue: Look! As luck would have it, I'm fresh out of merchandise!

Original: MERCHANT:Thanks to the Empire, my business is up!
Dialogue: Thanks to the Empire, my business is up!
trans: 感谢帝国，我的生意兴隆了！

Original: CELES:You're awfully short for a soldier.LOCKE:Oh, I forgot I was wearing a uniform!
Dialogue: You're awfully short for a soldier. LOCKE Oh, I forgot I was wearing a uniform!
trans: 作为一名士兵，你太矮了。

Original: CELES:What do you hope to peddle down here?LOCKE:Oops! Forgot I was wearing these clothes.
Dialogue: What do you hope to peddle down here? LOCKE Oops! Forgot I was wearing these clothes.
trans: 你希望在这里兜售什么？

Original: CELES:And you are...
Dialogue: And you are...

Original: SOLDIER:...more soup...'n...
Dialogue: ...more soup...'n...

Original: CELES:This passage leads out.
Dialogue: This passage leads out.

Original: BANON:Wait a sec!
Dialogue: Wait a sec!

Original: EDGAR:Hold on. I'm King Edgar of Figaro...
Dialogue: Hold on. I'm King Edgar of Figaro...

Original: BANON:Aye yai yai...
Dialogue: Aye yai yai...

Original: EDGAR:That kind of attitude is deadly! He won't even listen!
Dialogue: That kind of attitude is deadly! He won't even listen!

Original: TERRA:It's all my fault...
Dialogue: It's all my fault...

Original: AGED MAN:You the clock maker? I been waitin' for ages!
Dialogue: You the clock maker? I been waitin' for ages!

Original: AGED MAN:There it is, on the wall. Ain't been tickin' for 1, 5, shucks, maybe even 10 years!
Dialogue: There it is, on the wall. Ain't been tickin' for 1, 5, shucks, maybe even 10 years!

Original: AGED MAN:Lawnmower repairman, eh? Couldn't provide worse service! Grass's 25 feet high out back!
Dialogue: Lawnmower repairman, eh? Couldn't provide worse service! Grass's 25 feet high out back!

Original: AGED MAN:Got it! You're here to fix my bed! It's squeakin' like all git-out!
Dialogue: Got it! You're here to fix my bed! It's squeakin' like all git-out!

Original: AGED MAN:No more lip, repairman! Fix that stove, on the double!!!
Dialogue: No more lip, repairman! Fix that stove, on the double!!!

Original: AGED MAN:Goodness! Then you must be... You've come to fix the door!?
Dialogue: Goodness! Then you must be... You've come to fix the door!?

Original: AGED MAN:Child...? Ain't no child 'round here! Bolderdash! I'm ready for you to leave! Go on, git! I'm tossin' ya out onta the Veldt!
Dialogue: Child...? Ain't no child 'round here! Bolderdash! I'm ready for you to leave! Go on, git! I'm tossin' ya out onta the Veldt!

Original: MERCHANT:Howdy. I own the dry goods business out here! You're...not from these parts, huh? We'll, no matter!
Dialogue: Howdy. I own the dry goods business out here! You're...not from these parts, huh? We'll, no matter!

Original: MERCHANT:Welcome! Need anything?
Dialogue: Welcome! Need anything?

Original: MERCHANT:See you around.
Dialogue: See you around.

Original: MERCHANT:Good day. Need anything?
Dialogue: Good day. Need anything?

Original: (if the player had not met Shadow in South Figaro)SABIN:You...on a journey? I got separated from my friends. Say, can you tell me how to get to Narshe?
Dialogue: You...on a journey? I got separated from my friends. Say, can you tell me how to get to Narshe?

Original: MAN:The Empire has set up a base somewhere beyond the forest, and to the east.
Dialogue: The Empire has set up a base somewhere beyond the forest, and to the east.
trans: 帝国在森林之外的某个地方建立了一个基地，在东方。

Original: MAN:They seem to have their sights set on Doma Castle.
Dialogue: They seem to have their sights set on Doma Castle.
trans: 他们似乎将目光投向了多玛城。

Original: SABIN:Doma, huh? I have to reach Narshe immediately!
Dialogue: Doma, huh? I have to reach Narshe immediately!

Original: MAN:Your only chance is through Doma. I'll show you the way. Just know that I may take off at any time, if I feel like it.
Dialogue: Your only chance is through Doma. I'll show you the way. Just know that I may take off at any time, if I feel like it.
trans: 你唯一的机会是通过 Doma。

Original: SHADOW:Imperial soldiers have built a base somewhere beyond the forest.
Dialogue: Imperial soldiers have built a base somewhere beyond the forest.
trans: 帝国士兵在森林外的某个地方建立了一个基地。

Original: SHADOW:They seem to have their sights set on Doma Castle.
Dialogue: They seem to have their sights set on Doma Castle.
trans: 他们似乎将目光投向了多玛城。

Original: SABIN:So Doma's next, huh? I have to reach Narshe immediately!
Dialogue: So Doma's next, huh? I have to reach Narshe immediately!
trans: 所以 Doma 是下一个，是吗？

Original: SHADOW:Your only hope is through Doma. I'll show you the way. Just know that I may take off at any time, if I feel like it.
Dialogue: Your only hope is through Doma. I'll show you the way. Just know that I may take off at any time, if I feel like it.
trans: 你唯一的希望是通过 Doma。

Original: SHADOW:The Reaper is always just a step behind me...
Dialogue: The Reaper is always just a step behind me...
trans: 死神总是在我身后一步......

Original: SABIN:What the...? Where'd these soldiers come from?
Dialogue: What the...? Where'd these soldiers come from?

Original: SOLDIER:Who goes there?
Dialogue: Who goes there?

Original: SOLDIER:...??? I knew I heard something...

Dialogue: Wanna stop the train? Just use the controls in the engineer's compartment!

Dialogue: I'm from Maranda. The Empire invaded, and made me join their army. I fled when I heard we were making for Doma. They caught me...and did this... Now I can't even move. I'll never see Lola again... On the desk is a letter. Will you please read it?

What's wrong?GAU:Gau!!SABIN:G'uh! My pouch! There was 500 GP in it...!SABIN:Gau...YOU!(if the player has more than 500 GP)

Here. NPC This is Nikeah, one of the world's few port towns. NPC We used to be a trading town, but the Empire shut us down. NPC The land to the east, Doma, fell to the Empire. NPC Move along, now. His wife bore 'im a son 13 years ago. It was a problem birth, and the woman passed away. The man totally lost it. He thought the newborn was a monster. Wonder what happened to the poor little baby?DANCER:Yoo hoo! You handsome thing. How 'bout joining me? Tee hee!CYAN:H...how dare you... you licentious howler!DANCER:Geez, don't blow an artery, baby!CYAN:B...baby?!SABIN:Cyan... Don't let it get to you.
Dialogue: There used to be ships sailing to the southern continent. Tzen, Albrook, Maranda... They've all been smashed. NPC Ya met that odd man, lives near the Lete River? His wife bore 'im a son 13 years ago. It was a problem birth, and the woman passed away. The man totally lost it. He thought the newborn was a monster. Wonder what happened to the poor little baby? DANCER Yoo hoo! You handsome thing. How 'bout joining me? Tee hee! CYAN H...how dare you... you licentious howler! DANCER Geez, don't blow an artery, baby! CYAN B...baby?! SABIN Cyan... Don't let it get to you.

Dialogue: I'm not like that!

Original: SABIN:No one thinks you are. Just let it go.DANCER:Stop whispering! My ears are burnin', baby!CYAN:Enough! Have you no shame? I'll have you know...etc...etc.NPC:Goodness!NPC:You took one look at me and thought I was a loser, right? You're obligated to buy from me, now!NPC:Looks like junk, but... Have any imported goods?
Dialogue: No one thinks you are. Just let it go. DANCER Stop whispering! My ears are burnin', baby! CYAN Enough! Have you no shame? I'll have you know...etc...etc. NPC Goodness! NPC You took one look at me and thought I was a loser, right? You're obligated to buy from me, now! NPC Looks like junk, but... Have any imported goods?
